mapper.select: select * from( select rownum rn,to_char(a.begintime,'yyyy/MM/dd') begintime,a.id,a.money,(a.money*0.01*d.item) shouyi,a.readstate,c.housingquantity,e.item purpose,f.realname,f.sex,nvl(g.state,0) state,h.userid,k.username from tb_investmentlist a join tb_tendering b on a.tendid=b.id left join tb_borrow c on b.borrow=c.id join tb_systemcategoryitem d on c.longtime=d.id join tb_systemcategoryitem e on c.purpose=e.id join TB_REALNAME f on c.REALID=f.id left join tb_loanrecord g on g.tendid=b.id left join TB_REALNAME h on a.REALID=h.id join tb_user k on h.userid=k.userid where rownum <#{end} ) i where i.rn >#{start} and i.username=#{username} and i.readstate=1
select count(*) from tb_investmentlist a left join tb_realname b on a.realid=b.id join tb_user c on b.userid=c.userid where c.username=#{username} and a.readstate=1

select sum(a.money) leiji,(sum(a.money*0.01*d.item)) income from tb_investmentlist a join tb_tendering b on a.tendid=b.id left join tb_borrow c on b.borrow=c.id join tb_systemcategoryitem d on c.longtime=d.id join TB_REALNAME f on c.REALID=f.id left join tb_loanrecord g on g.tendid=b.id left join TB_REALNAME h on a.REALID=h.id join tb_user k on h.userid=k.userid where k.username=#{username}
mapper.update: update tb_investmentlist set READSTATE=2 where id=#{ID}
